âœ¨ Key Features: â€¢ Configurable Layout â€¢ Multiple Data Sources (script, api, todo) â€¢ Component Types (Text, List, Todo, Chart, Table) â€¢ Terminal UI (Bubble Tea) â€¢ Navigation (arrow keys, hjkl, mouse)
ðŸ“– Summary: Dashbrew is a terminal dashboard builder that allows users to visualize data from scripts and APIs directly in their console. It offers configurable layouts, supports multiple data sources (scripts, APIs, todo lists), and provides various component types like text, lists, charts, and tables. Built with Bubble Tea, it features navigation, auto-refresh, and mouse support for an interactive terminal experience.
